modal.description: Move, zoom or rotate the image to get the best scene
modal.title: Title

main.description:
Have you ever wanted to have your own character on a Duel Card? Or make a deck of all your friends? 
 You can create your own personalized Duel Card to share on social media or wherever you want! Choose the background, details and download the image. You can choose simple card or even with a 'shine' effect, just like the cards in the game!
